T02TD1503E:259b-1: shr'i badzra d'a ki n'a ma ma h'a tan'a r'a dza autte yam bo dhi tsitta aa ba lo ka m'a las dha no pi ka n'a ma /
T02TD1503E:259b-3: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las btus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub kyi sems kun du gzigs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1503E:259b-4: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1503E:259b-6: dpa' bo rdo rje can btud nas ;
T02TD1503E:259b-7: / rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1503E:259b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02TD1503E:259b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog / dang por ro ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:259b-10: sgrub po de yi ster gnas te //
T02TD1503E:259b-11: hu ru ka nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:259b-12: zhes bya ba la de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1503E:259b-13: rang gi snying gar re pha las ;
T02TD1503E:259b-14: ; byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom /
T02TD1503E:259b-15: de nyid du ni h'um zhes pa //
T02TD1503E:259b-16: thabs dang shes rab gzugs can bsam //
T02TD1503E:259b-17: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje ni //
T02TD1503E:259b-18: kha dog nag po drag chen po //
T02TD1503E:259b-19: de yi lte ba'i dbus gnas par //
T02TD1503E:259b-20: slar yang h'um gi de nyid bsgom //
T02TD1503E:259b-21: h'um ni yongs su gyur pa las//
T02TD1503E:259b-22: sgrub po zhe sdang bdag nyid bsam //
T02TD1503E:259b-23: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02TD1503E:259b-24: rang gi lhag pa'i lha gzugs bya //
T02TD1503E:259b-25: khro la sa bon sngon po ste //
T02TD1503E:259b-26: rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:259b-27: zhi ba'i sa bon zla ba'i mdog / zla ba rdo rje la gnas bsam //
T02TD1503E:259b-28: sgrub po lha yi gzugs bzung la //
T02TD1503E:260a-0: @260a * // de nas lha yi mchod pa spro //
T02TD1503E:260a-1: lha yi mig dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1503E:260a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bya //
T02TD1503E:260a-3: bcom ldan rdo rje cang yis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:260a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos sa bon //
T02TD1503E:260a-6: rang snying zla bar bsams nas su //
T02TD1503E:260a-7: bde gshegs de yi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1503E:260a-8: mdun du bkug par blta bar bya //
T02TD1503E:260a-9: aargha la sogs lung byung ba //
T02TD1503E:260a-10: phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod sogs bya //
T02TD1503E:260a-11: de nas phyag ni byas nas su //
T02TD1503E:260a-13: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD1503E:260a-14: kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1503E:260a-15: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02TD1503E:260a-16: dus 'di nas bzung ji srid du //
T02TD1503E:260a-17: byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar //
T02TD1503E:260a-18: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD1503E:260a-19: yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa //
T02TD1503E:260a-20: de bzhin bla med byang chub sems //
T02TD1503E:260a-21: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar bgyi //
T02TD1503E:260a-22: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sngom pa la //
T02TD1503E:260a-23: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1503E:260a-24: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD1503E:260a-25: de da nas brtsams te mchog tu gzung //
T02TD1503E:260a-26: bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02TD1503E:260a-27: dge ba'i chos ni bsrung ba dang //
T02TD1503E:260a-28: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum ;
T02TD1503E:260a-29: / bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung //
T02TD1503E:260a-30: rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1503E:260a-31: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD1503E:260a-32: yang dag nyid gzung bgyi zhing //
T02TD1503E:260a-33: slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis bzung //
T02TD1503E:260a-34: rin chen ris mchog rnal 'byor gyi //
T02TD1503E:260a-35: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD1503E:260a-36: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD1503E:260a-37: sbyin pa rnam bzhi stsal bar bgyi //
T02TD1503E:260a-38: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD1503E:260a-39: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02TD1503E:260a-40: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD1503E:260a-41: dam chos yang dag gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1503E:260a-42: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1503E:260a-43: mchod pa ci nus bgyid pa dang ;
T02TD1503E:260a-44: / sngom pa thams cad ldan par bgyi //
T02TD1503E:260a-45: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02TD1503E:260a-46: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02TD1503E:260a-47: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1503E:260a-48: sngom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1503E:260a-49: ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD1503E:260b-0: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis @260b dgrol ;
T02TD1503E:260b-1: / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD1503E:260b-3: byams dang snying rje byas nas su //
T02TD1503E:260b-4: dge ba la ni dga' ba bsgom //
T02TD1503E:260b-5: mi dge'i chos la btang snyoms bya //
T02TD1503E:260b-6: sdig bshags la sogs de bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:260b-7: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs ;
T02TD1503E:260b-8: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang sngom pa gzung ba'o //
T02TD1503E:260b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gsol nas //
T02TD1503E:260b-11: bdag gis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1503E:260b-12: gang nas ma byon gar ma gshegs //
T02TD1503E:260b-13: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
T02TD1503E:260b-14: gang yin lha yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1503E:260b-15: rnal 'byor de nyid rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD1503E:260b-16: blo dang ldan pas de nyid bsgom //
T02TD1503E:260b-17: gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1503E:260b-18: tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin //
T02TD1503E:260b-20: 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin ;
T02TD1503E:260b-21: / rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02TD1503E:260b-22: 'di dag kun dngos rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1503E:260b-23: rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grags //
T02TD1503E:260b-24: yang dag gcig pu chen po'i lha //
T02TD1503E:260b-25: bde ba thams cad ba ster ba //
T02TD1503E:260b-26: sku ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1503E:260b-27: chags bral chags ba zhes byar bshad ;
T02TD1503E:260b-28: / sa khams ltung byed ma yin te //
T02TD1503E:260b-29: de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o //
T02TD1503E:260b-30: me khams 'gus byed ma yin te //
T02TD1503E:260b-31: de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo //
T02TD1503E:260b-32: nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu ma cher //
T02TD1503E:260b-33: rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1503E:260b-34: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1503E:260b-36: 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1503E:260b-37: de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas //
T02TD1503E:260b-38: mig gnyis gti mug rdo rje bshad //
T02TD1503E:260b-39: nyan pa zhes sdang rdo rje brjod //
T02TD1503E:260b-40: sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste //
T02TD1503E:260b-41: kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs //
T02TD1503E:260b-42: lus ni phrag dog rdo rje ste //
T02TD1503E:260b-43: skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1503E:260b-44: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs /
T02TD1503E:260b-45: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1503E:260b-46: aom sv'a bh'a ba shudda:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1503E:260b-47: de nas dngos kun las grol ba'i //
T02TD1503E:261a-2: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1503E:261a-3: nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1503E:261a-4: khams gsum pa ni ma lus ba'i //
T02TD1503E:261a-5: 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bu yin //
T02TD1503E:261a-6: brtan pa dang ni g-yo pa yi //
T02TD1503E:261a-7: 'gro ba dmigs sa med pa ste //
T02TD1503E:261a-8: mthong ba dang ni reg pa'i dngos //
T02TD1503E:261a-9: thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:261a-10: gzugs ni thams cad stong pa nyid //
T02TD1503E:261a-11: stong pa'i tshul gyi mig gis ni //
T02TD1503E:261a-12: dogs pa med par bsgom pa'i mchog / rnam par mi rtog pa yis blta //
T02TD1503E:261a-13: nam mkha'i tshul gyi sems kyis ni //
T02TD1503E:261a-14: der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos ;
T02TD1503E:261a-15: / dogs pa med pa'i bsgom par ldan //
T02TD1503E:261a-16: rnam par mi rtog skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1503E:261a-17: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1503E:261a-18: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:261a-19: stong pa nyid ni byang chub bo //
T02TD1503E:261a-20: sna tshogs padma'i nyi dkyil la //
T02TD1503E:261a-21: der ni h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD1503E:261a-22: dbus gnas las kyi rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD1503E:261a-23: slar yang h'um gi de nyid bsam //
T02TD1503E:261a-26: zhal gcig phyag 'tshal gnyis spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1503E:261a-27: sku mdog dmar mo drag chen mo //
T02TD1503E:261a-28: mdung gi dbyibs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1503E:261a-29: spyan dmar kham skra gyen du brdzes //
T02TD1503E:261a-30: lang tshe phun sum tshogs par ldan //
T02TD1503E:261a-31: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can //
T02TD1503E:261a-34: de nas rdo rje sngags spro bya //
T02TD1503E:261a-35: aom su mbha ni su mbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:261a-36: aom gri hna gri h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:261a-37: aom gri hna pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:261a-38: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:261a-39: der sngags tshig ni 'di dag gis //
T02TD1503E:261a-40: lha dang lha min mir bcas pa //
T02TD1503E:261a-41: phur bu yis ni btab nas su //
T02TD1503E:261a-42: h'um sngags 'od kyi ra ba dang //
T02TD1503E:261a-43: khyad par du ni dra ba bya //
T02TD1503E:261a-44: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:261a-45: srung ba'i 'khor lo dang sngags kyi tshig rnams so //
T02TD1503E:261a-46: shes rab mkha' dbyings dbus bsam pa //
T02TD1503E:261a-47: rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1503E:261a-48: de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02TD1503E:261a-49: chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:261a-50: chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02TD1503E:261b-0: dbang chen @261b dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
T02TD1503E:261b-1: 'byung ba thams cad bsdus pa las //
T02TD1503E:261b-2: gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-3: gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa //
T02TD1503E:261b-4: kha khyer de bzhin rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1503E:261b-5: skud pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:261b-6: dar gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas //
T02TD1503E:261b-7: dkyil 'khor grva rnams thams cad dang //
T02TD1503E:261b-8: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1503E:261b-9: rdo rje rin chen rnam spras pa'i //
T02TD1503E:261b-10: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-11: shas rab can gyis de yi nang //
T02TD1503E:261b-12: 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan te //
T02TD1503E:261b-13: de yi dbus gyur padma ni //
T02TD1503E:261b-14: dkar pos shin tu mdzes par bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-15: de yi yang ni steng gyur pa //
T02TD1503E:261b-17: slar yang de yi dbus gyur par //
T02TD1503E:261b-19: de nas sngags pa de nang du //
T02TD1503E:261b-20: rdo rje phreng ba kun 'khrug bri //
T02TD1503E:261b-21: slar yang pad chen 'dab brgyad pa //
T02TD1503E:261b-23: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su ;
T02TD1503E:261b-24: / dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1503E:261b-25: ri rab lhun po'i steng du ni //
T02TD1503E:261b-27: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:261b-29: de dbus stan la rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1503E:261b-30: dbyangs yig bcu drug las byung ba'i //
T02TD1503E:261b-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-32: 'od zer kun du rnam par spro //
T02TD1503E:261b-33: de steng ye shes sa bon las //
T02TD1503E:261b-34: rdo rje nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-35: zla ba rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1503E:261b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-37: nyi ma rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyis //
T02TD1503E:261b-38: khro bo'i lus su rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1503E:261b-39: zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pa //
T02TD1503E:261b-40: lha rnams skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02TD1503E:261b-42: a'a lis zla ba k'a lis nyi //
T02TD1503E:261b-43: dbus su sa bon bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:261b-44: de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1503E:261b-45: mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can no //
T02TD1503E:261b-47: rang lus las byung 'od zer gyis ;
T02TD1503E:261b-48: / nam mkha' thams cad g-yogs nas ni //
T02TD1503E:261b-49: bsdus te bkug nas btsud pa yi //
T02TD1503E:261b-51: zla ba ltar dkar 'dzum dang bcas //
T02TD1503E:261b-52: 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba 'khrug / sangs rgyas phreng ba yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:262a-0: rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag @262a * //
T02TD1503E:262a-2: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1503E:262a-3: ral pa dang ni cod pan ldan //
T02TD1503E:262a-4: rig pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:262a-5: spyan gsum 'bar ba chen po ste //
T02TD1503E:262a-6: g-yas pa dkar min shin du zhi //
T02TD1503E:262a-7: g-yon pa dmar zhing 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1503E:262a-8: rgyab zhal gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog / rdo rje kha tv'i bsnams pa dang //
T02TD1503E:262a-9: de bzhin thod pa dril bu bsnams //
T02TD1503E:262a-10: thod pa la bzhugs gar dang ldan //
T02TD1503E:262a-11: dbang gnyis dga' ba'i snyoms zhugs shing //
T02TD1503E:262a-12: rgyal ba'i 'od zer kun du 'khrug / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:262a-14: shes rab gnas kyi mthar thug par //
T02TD1503E:262a-15: smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing //
T02TD1503E:262a-16: sems can don brtson sems kyis ni //
T02TD1503E:262a-17: dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad //
T02TD1503E:262a-18: rtag tu 'dod pas myos pa yi //
T02TD1503E:262a-19: lha yi bu 'di rnams dang ni //
T02TD1503E:262a-20: gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir //
T02TD1503E:262a-21: 'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad //
T02TD1503E:262a-22: bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir //
T02TD1503E:262a-23: rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang //
T02TD1503E:262a-24: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / rtog pa thams cad la sogs bshad //
T02TD1503E:262a-25: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02TD1503E:262a-26: rtog pa la sogs bde ba che //
T02TD1503E:262a-27: der ni rdo rje sems chen gyis //
T02TD1503E:262a-28: lhag pa yi ni lha gcig bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:262a-29: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD1503E:262a-30: sems can kun don 'byung bya'i phyir //
T02TD1503E:262a-31: glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar //
T02TD1503E:262a-32: srid pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur //
T02TD1503E:262a-33: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1503E:262a-34: dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa'i nga //
T02TD1503E:262a-35: de nas sems kyi 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD1503E:262a-36: 'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te //
T02TD1503E:262a-37: des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su //
T02TD1503E:262a-38: 'dod chags chen po ston par mdzad //
T02TD1503E:262a-39: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1503E:262a-40: chos kyi sku yi chos nyid do //
T02TD1503E:262a-41: bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs //
T02TD1503E:262a-42: shes rab dang kun du 'khyud pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1503E:262a-43: ri bo ri sul tshang tshing phug / chu bo chen po'i 'gram rnams dang //
T02TD1503E:262a-44: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du //
T02TD1503E:262a-45: der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya //
T02TD1503E:262a-47: bde ba chen po mi g-yo bas na ri bo'o //
T02TD1503E:262b-0: sems can sman par 'jug par dga' bas na ri @262b su la te phug dang ldan pas tshang tshing ngo //
T02TD1503E:262b-1: tshu po chen po'i 'gram rnams zhes bya ba ni de dang snyoms par 'jug pa shes rab kyi chu gnas pas na chu bo'i 'gram mo //
T02TD1503E:262b-2: gdod nas grub pa zhes bya ba ni rtag tu grub pa ste 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing nam mkha' ltar yongs su grub brtag tu bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o //
T02TD1503E:262b-3: dur khrod ces bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1503E:262b-4: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:262b-5: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so //
T02TD1503E:262b-6: lag gnyis kun du 'khyud ba ni //
T02TD1503E:262b-7: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings brjod //
T02TD1503E:262b-8: kha sbyor lu gu rgyud du bzhed //
T02TD1503E:262b-9: slar yang rnam par grol ba'i lam //
T02TD1503E:262b-11: rdo rje padma dbye ba dang //
T02TD1503E:262b-12: sgro chun sprang rtsi byed par bshad //
T02TD1503E:262b-13: bskor ba gang phyir bskyod pa dang //
T02TD1503E:262b-14: mi 'khrugs rdo rjes dkrug par bya //
T02TD1503E:262b-15: der ni gsal shing zhes byar brjod //
T02TD1503E:262b-16: rdo rje thams cad mid par bya //
T02TD1503E:262b-17: rdo rje zhes byed bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1503E:262b-18: de yi chags pa lcags kyu ste //
T02TD1503E:262b-19: lcags kyu'i sbyor ba cho gas dgug / rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su //
T02TD1503E:262b-20: padma'i mdzod du gzhug par bya //
T02TD1503E:262b-21: dbang bskur ba yi cho ga yis //
T02TD1503E:262b-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhu //
T02TD1503E:262b-23: gsang ba'i yig gsum sngags kyi mchog / sna tshogs yi ye yang dag sdro [?] //
T02TD1503E:262b-24: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:262b-25: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing gdon pa'o //
T02TD1503E:262b-26: 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas //
T02TD1503E:262b-27: yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing //
T02TD1503E:262b-28: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med po //
T02TD1503E:262b-29: dag pa nyid du de nas son //
T02TD1503E:262b-30: de nas sems can sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1503E:262b-31: bla med don ni nus med pa'i //
T02TD1503E:262b-32: stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas //
T02TD1503E:262b-33: 'gro kun stong bas bcom nas ni //
T02TD1503E:262b-34: thams cad dmyal bar ltung mthong ste //
T02TD1503E:262b-35: slar yang bdag dang gzhan don la //
T02TD1503E:262b-36: mos pas gus pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1503E:262b-37: de nas 'jig rten khams kun na //
T02TD1503E:262b-38: bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te //
T02TD1503E:262b-39: bdag la myur du bskur bar mdzod //
T02TD1503E:262b-40: aom ba h'a su kha badzrasatva dza: h'um bam ho: su ra te stvam //
T02TD1503E:263a-2: dag pa'i bde ba kun ster ba //
T02TD1503E:263a-3: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing //
T02TD1503E:263a-5: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:263a-6: khu ba'i gtso bo bskul ba'o //
T02TD1503E:263a-7: de nas mkha' dbyings dbus gyur par //
T02TD1503E:263a-8: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02TD1503E:263a-9: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nam mkha' la //
T02TD1503E:263a-10: dpag med rigs kyis yongs gang ba'o //
T02TD1503E:263a-11: mkha' dbyings nyi ma da dbus su //
T02TD1503E:263a-12: rang gi sa bon mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1503E:263a-13: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa yi //
T02TD1503E:263a-14: 'od zer rnon po 'bar zhing 'khrug / me stag 'phro bas bdud sde bsreg / gang bur bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1503E:263a-15: zhu ba las ni skur bzhings [?] pa //
T02TD1503E:263a-16: zhal bzhi pa dang phyag bzhi pa'am //
T02TD1503E:263a-17: ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar //
T02TD1503E:263a-18: gdan dang mdog dang phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD1503E:263a-19: rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1503E:263a-20: phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1503E:263a-21: sku gsum chos ni ston par mdzad //
T02TD1503E:263a-22: ting 'dzin yan lag shes par bya //
T02TD1503E:263a-23: bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rigs pas so //
T02TD1503E:263a-24: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:263a-26: nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
T02TD1503E:263a-27: nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin //
T02TD1503E:263a-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor 'phrog cing //
T02TD1503E:263a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che //
T02TD1503E:263a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po //
T02TD1503E:263a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa //
T02TD1503E:263a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen yin //
T02TD1503E:263a-33: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che //
T02TD1503E:263a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che //
T02TD1503E:263a-35: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso //
T02TD1503E:263a-36: rin chen 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang //
T02TD1503E:263a-37: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:263a-38: rdo rje can gyi yon tan no //
T02TD1503E:263a-39: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:263a-40: aom gri hna gri hna h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1503E:263a-41: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:263a-42: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1503E:263a-43: zhal bzhi byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i sngags gsungs te /
T02TD1503E:263a-45: aom dharma dh'a tu svabh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1503E:263b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang @263b mdog / phyag dang bzhugs tshul de bzhin te //
T02TD1503E:263b-1: sku mdog sngon po cher drag pa //
T02TD1503E:263b-3: 'bar ba'i sku lus sgra che ba //
T02TD1503E:263b-5: lhag ger bzhad chen tshems kyi 'od //
T02TD1503E:263b-7: 'khor lo bla re dbus gnas shing //
T02TD1503E:263b-8: 'od ldan phyag ni bzhi bzhi dang //
T02TD1503E:263b-9: thong ka sgyu ma chen mos mdzes //
T02TD1503E:263b-10: g-yon pa padma r'a ga mtshungs //
T02TD1503E:263b-11: shin tu khros pas 'jigs su rung //
T02TD1503E:263b-13: dza ba'i ku su ma dang mtshungs //
T02TD1503E:263b-14: g-yas pa shel dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD1503E:263b-16: rgyab ni gser bsregs lta bur 'bar //
T02TD1503E:263b-17: nyi ma 'char ka lta bur mdzes //
T02TD1503E:263b-18: rtsa zhal sngon po chen po ste //
T02TD1503E:263b-19: spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes par byas //
T02TD1503E:263b-20: yi dags chen po mnan nas su //
T02TD1503E:263b-21: nyi ma la bzhugs gar dang bcas //
T02TD1503E:263b-22: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga /
T02TD1503E:263b-23: de bzhin gzhan na mda' dang gzhu //
T02TD1503E:263b-24: cho ga'i bya ba de nyid kyis //
T02TD1503E:263b-25: ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:263b-26: shar ni dkar zhing 'od sngo ste //
T02TD1503E:263b-27: g-yon pa kha tv'am dril bu dang //
T02TD1503E:263b-28: gzhan na rdo rje thod pa'o //
T02TD1503E:263b-29: byang phyogs margad ser skya'i mdog / g-yon na kha tv'am zhags pa dang //
T02TD1503E:263b-30: g-yas na rde'u chung thod pa bsnams //
T02TD1503E:263b-31: nub phyogs dmar zhing ser skya'i 'od //
T02TD1503E:263b-32: gzhu dang mda' yi mdog dang ni //
T02TD1503E:263b-33: sna tshogs padma thod pa dag / g-yon dang g-yas kyi phyag tu dgod //
T02TD1503E:263b-34: lho ni dkar zhing ser ba'i 'ong //
T02TD1503E:263b-35: g-yon na mdung dang rin chen te //
T02TD1503E:263b-36: g-yas na ba dan thod pa bsnams /
T02TD1503E:263b-37: glang chen ce sbyang mi dang ni //
T02TD1503E:263b-38: glang gi thod pa cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1503E:263b-39: dang po ltung byed ma yin te //
T02TD1503E:263b-40: gnyis pa gsod byed ma yin la //
T02TD1503E:263b-41: gsum pa 'gugs pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD1503E:263b-42: bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1503E:263b-43: rig ma de dag gyen skra 'bar //
T02TD1503E:263b-44: rgyan rnams thams cad rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1503E:263b-45: gar dang ldan pas yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:263b-46: phyogs mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru //
T02TD1503E:263b-47: thod pa rnam pa bzhi po dgod //
T02TD1503E:263b-48: sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1503E:263b-49: spyi gtsug gsal bar yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:263b-50: bde ba chen po rin chen che //
T02TD1503E:263b-51: 'byung ba bzhi yi tshogs dang ldan //
T02TD1503E:264a-2: rtag tu lha mo bzhi yi dngos //
T02TD1503E:264a-3: aom ha ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste snying gar ro //
T02TD1503E:264a-4: na ma hini rnam par snang mdzad de mgo bor ro //
T02TD1503E:264a-5: sv'a h'a n'a ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug ste spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-6: boo shata he ni dpal he mu ka ste phrag pa gnyis la'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-7: h'um h'um ho ni rdo rje nyi ma ste mig gnyis su'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-8: phat ham rta mgrin te yan lag thams cad kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-9: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la thugs rdo rje h'um gis bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-10: aa hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat kyis ni mgrin par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i gsung rdo rje'o//
T02TD1503E:264a-11: aom badzra he ha ru ru kam h'um h'um phat d'a ki n'i dzva la sambha ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:264a-12: zhes bya bas ni dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sku rdo rje'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-13: de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' go cha dang /
T02TD1503E:264a-14: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-15: lte ba la ni aom bam ste rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-16: snying gar ham yam ste gshin rje ma'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-17: yom khar ni hrim mom ste rmongs byed ma'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-18: mgo bor ni hrim hrim ste kun du skyong byed ma'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-19: spyi gtsug tu ni h'um h'um ste kun du skrag byed ma'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-20: yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon tshar ni phat phat te gtum pa mo'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-21: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna ni ye h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1503E:264a-22: zhes bya bas ni lte bar thugs rdo rje lta bu'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-23: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:264a-24: zhes bya bas ni snying gar sku rdo rje lta bu'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-25: aom boo ri h'um h'um phat ces bya bas ni //
T02TD1503E:264a-26: khar te gsung rdo rje lta bu'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-27: de ltar gang zhig kun bstan pa //
T02TD1503E:264a-28: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lus las byung //
T02TD1503E:264a-29: shes rab zla ba'i stan la gnas ;
T02TD1503E:264a-30: / sna tshogs mdog tu bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:264a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1503E:264a-32: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:264a-33: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi las te nye bar bsgrub pa'i sgrub thabs so //
T02TD1503E:264a-34: ye shes dam tshig las byung ba //
T02TD1503E:264a-35: de ni rdo rje can du brjod //
T02TD1503E:264a-36: ces bya ba la ye shes ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-37: dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1503E:264a-38: de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te /
T02TD1503E:264a-39: rang gi sa bon mtshan ma las //
T02TD1503E:264a-40: snying gar ye shes sems dpa' dgong //
T02TD1503E:264a-41: de yi 'od kyis drangs nas ni //
T02TD1503E:264a-42: ye shes 'khor lo rab mchod bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-0: rdo rje srung ba'i go cha @264b ni ;
T02TD1503E:264b-1: / mnyam par gzhag pas thams cad bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-2: de 'og dngos po thams cad kyis //
T02TD1503E:264b-3: bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1503E:264b-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:264b-6: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1503E:264b-7: dbang bskur go 'phang bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1503E:264b-8: de 'og mchod pa brtag par bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-9: ye shes 'khor lo rim pa yis //
T02TD1503E:264b-10: mdun du rgyal ba bkug nas ni //
T02TD1503E:264b-11: mchod pa kun gyis mchod nas ni //
T02TD1503E:264b-12: dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1503E:264b-13: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD1503E:264b-14: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma kun dang //
T02TD1503E:264b-15: sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po yis //
T02TD1503E:264b-16: brtse bas bdag la dbang bskur gsol //
T02TD1503E:264b-17: des ni sangs rgyas hi ru ka'i //
T02TD1503E:264b-18: tshul du nam mkhar bzhugs nas ni //
T02TD1503E:264b-19: bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi //
T02TD1503E:264b-20: bum pa kha dog lngar ldan pa'i //
T02TD1503E:264b-21: kun nas dbang ni skur bar mdzad //
T02TD1503E:264b-22: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD1503E:264b-23: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD1503E:264b-24: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1503E:264b-25: rin chen dbang bskur chen po sbyin //
T02TD1503E:264b-26: rgyal bas dbang ni bskur nas su //
T02TD1503E:264b-27: spyan ma la sogs glu len cing //
T02TD1503E:264b-28: mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis kyang //
T02TD1503E:264b-29: mchod pa kun gyis rab mchod byed ;
T02TD1503E:264b-30: / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1503E:264b-31: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:264b-32: dbang bskur ba yang mchod pa'o //
T02TD1503E:264b-33: mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-34: de yi rim pa 'di yin te //
T02TD1503E:264b-35: bu mo yi ni sna rtse ru //
T02TD1503E:264b-36: aa zhes bya bar god par bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-37: rang gi rdo rje'i bu gar ni ;
T02TD1503E:264b-38: / bam zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar //
T02TD1503E:264b-39: gang yang gzhan dag 'chad pa ni //
T02TD1503E:264b-40: bya zhes bya ba padma la //
T02TD1503E:264b-41: by'a ni rdo rje'i rtse mor ro //
T02TD1503E:264b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1503E:264b-43: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:264b-44: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dga' ba ste sbyor ba dang po zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1503E:264b-45: mchog tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1503E:264b-46: rdo rje padma phye nis su //
T02TD1503E:264b-47: lam gyi tshogs kyi rgyun nas ni //
T02TD1503E:264b-48: slar yang spro zhing gtang bar bya //
T02TD1503E:264b-50: padma'i lte bar nges par sbyar //
T02TD1503E:264b-51: aa wa dh'u t'i'i gnas de bzhin //
T02TD1503E:265a-2: dbyangs yig dang po yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:265a-3: bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar //
T02TD1503E:265a-4: de nas 'bar phreng rgya mchor ni //
T02TD1503E:265a-5: kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo bsam //
T02TD1503E:265a-6: mgal me 'khor lo la gnas pa //
T02TD1503E:265a-8: yid shugs chen pos gsal ba'i mdangs //
T02TD1503E:265a-9: glog lta bur ni gsal ba'i 'od //
T02TD1503E:265a-10: lha yi rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1503E:265a-11: sa rnams kun du spro bar bya //
T02TD1503E:265a-12: de nyid dbye bas phya nas su //
T02TD1503E:265a-13: rtsa rnams thams cad lam du sbyar //
T02TD1503E:265a-14: sngags pas rang dgar dbye byas te //
T02TD1503E:265a-15: phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar ;
T02TD1503E:265a-16: / char gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i //
T02TD1503E:265a-17: las kyi mchog tu rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1503E:265a-18: sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la //
T02TD1503E:265a-19: dga' chin rnyed dka' 'di yis bsgrub //
T02TD1503E:265a-20: ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas //
T02TD1503E:265a-21: yul dang yul du mngon par skye //
T02TD1503E:265a-23: rang rang sa la rnam par rol //
T02TD1503E:265a-24: mgo po pull'i'i ra yin te //
T02TD1503E:265a-25: so dang sen mo rab tu 'bab //
T02TD1503E:265a-26: rab gtum mo dang thod dum gyis //
T02TD1503E:265a-27: shar gyi rtsibs su yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265a-28: spyi gtsug dz'a landha ra ste //
T02TD1503E:265a-29: skra dang spu ni rab tu 'bab //
T02TD1503E:265a-30: gtum mig keng rus chen po yis //
T02TD1503E:265a-31: lus ngan phyogs su yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265a-32: ao dyan zhes bya'i gnas chen po //
T02TD1503E:265a-33: rna ba g-yas pa'i bla dags te //
T02TD1503E:265a-34: nub tu pags pa dri ma lags //
T02TD1503E:265a-35: 'od ldan keng rus tshul gyis bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265a-36: aa rbu da ni rgyab kyi phyogs //
T02TD1503E:265a-37: sha chen dag ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265a-38: mche ba gtsigs dang sna chen ma //
T02TD1503E:265a-39: lho yi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265a-41: go d'a ba r'i rna g-yon te //
T02TD1503E:265a-42: rtag tu rgyus pa 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265a-43: dpa' bo'i blo ma lha yi dgra //
T02TD1503E:265a-44: dbang ldan mtshams su bzhugs par bsam //
T02TD1503E:265a-45: smin dbus r'a me shra r'i ste //
T02TD1503E:265a-46: rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265a-47: mi thung mgon po 'od dpag med //
T02TD1503E:265a-48: rlung gi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265a-49: mig gnyis lha mo'i mkha' yin te //
T02TD1503E:265a-50: rtag tu mchin pa 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265a-51: lang ka'i dbang mo rdo rje 'od //
T02TD1503E:265a-52: bden bral mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265a-53: m'a la be ni dpur g-yas te //
T02TD1503E:265b-1: / ljon grib ma ni rdo rje'i sku //
T02TD1503E:265b-2: byin za'i mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-3: de dag ni nye ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1503E:265b-4: yul de kun na gnas pa rnams //
T02TD1503E:265b-5: thugs kyi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265b-6: mkha' la spyod pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD1503E:265b-7: snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265b-8: mtshan khung k'a ma r'u pa ste //
T02TD1503E:265b-9: rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-10: sa srung ma dang myu gu can //
T02TD1503E:265b-11: shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265b-12: ao te nu ma gnyis yin te //
T02TD1503E:265b-13: mkhris pa'i khams ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-14: rdo rje ral can 'jigs byed ma //
T02TD1503E:265b-15: lus ngan phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-17: lte bar tri sha ku ni ste //
T02TD1503E:265b-18: rtag tu glo ba 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-19: rlung shugs dpa' bo chen mo ni //
T02TD1503E:265b-20: nub kyi 'dab mar brten te bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265b-21: ko sa la ni sna rtse ste //
T02TD1503E:265b-22: rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-23: chang 'thung rdo rje h'um mdzad du //
T02TD1503E:265b-24: lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-26: kha ni ka ling ga yin te //
T02TD1503E:265b-27: gnye ma'i khams ni rab tu 'bab //
T02TD1503E:265b-28: sngo bsangs lha mo shin tu bzang //
T02TD1503E:265b-29: yi dags phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-30: mgrin pa lamp'a ka yin te //
T02TD1503E:265b-31: bong bu'i lto ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-32: shin tu bzang mo rdo rje bzang //
T02TD1503E:265b-33: rlung gi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-35: snying ga k'anytsi yul yin te //
T02TD1503E:265b-36: rtag tu chu so 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-38: srin po'i mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-39: kha ba can ni chu so ste //
T02TD1503E:265b-40: mtshog ma'i srubs ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-41: bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang //
T02TD1503E:265b-42: ma yi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:265b-44: yul de kun na gang gnas pa //
T02TD1503E:265b-45: gsung gi 'khor lor yang dag gnas //
T02TD1503E:265b-46: sa la rgyu ba zhes bya ste //
T02TD1503E:265b-47: snyoms par zhus pas yang dag gnas //
T02TD1503E:265b-48: mtshan ni yi dags lha gnas te //
T02TD1503E:265b-49: bad kan khams ni rtag tu 'bab //
T02TD1503E:265b-50: 'khor lo shugs ma stobs po che //
T02TD1503E:265b-51: sku yi 'khor lo shar rtsibs bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:265b-52: bshang lam lha yi khyim yin te //
T02TD1503E:265b-54: rin chen rdo rje lus ngan du //
T02TD1503E:265b-56: soo r'ashta ni brla gnyis te //
T02TD1503E:265b-57: khrag gi khams ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:265b-58: glang sna dang ni rta mgrin du //
T02TD1503E:266a-2: byin pa gnyis ni gser gling ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-3: rtag tu rdul ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:266a-4: 'khor lo'i go cha nam mkha'i snying //
T02TD1503E:266a-5: lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:266a-7: sor mo rnams ni grong khyer te //
T02TD1503E:266a-10: shin tu dpa' mo he ru kar //
T02TD1503E:266a-11: yi dags mtshams su bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD1503E:266a-12: sindhu rkang pa'i bol yin te //
T02TD1503E:266a-13: rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:266a-14: stobs chen padma gar dbang phyug / rlung gi mtshams su dgod par bya //
T02TD1503E:266a-16: mya ngam yul ni mthe bo ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-17: lud pa dag ni 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:266a-18: 'khor los sgyur ma rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1503E:266a-19: bden bral mtshams su dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1503E:266a-20: ku lu t'a ni pus mo ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-21: rtag tu sna chu 'bab pa las //
T02TD1503E:266a-22: brtson chen rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1503E:266a-23: me yi mtshams su dgod par bya //
T02TD1503E:266a-25: yul ni de dag thams cad nyid //
T02TD1503E:266a-26: sku yi 'khor lor yang dag gnas //
T02TD1503E:266a-27: sa 'og gnas pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-28: snyoms par zhugs pas rab tu bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:266a-29: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni //
T02TD1503E:266a-30: pho nya rnams ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD1503E:266a-31: khva gdong ma ni shar sgor te //
T02TD1503E:266a-32: byang sgor 'ug pa'i gdong pa can //
T02TD1503E:266a-33: nub sgor khyi yi gdong pa can //
T02TD1503E:266a-34: phag gi gdong can lho sgor dgod //
T02TD1503E:266a-35: dbang ldan gshin rje brtan ma ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-36: gshin rje pho nya me mtshams su //
T02TD1503E:266a-37: bden bral gshin rje mche ba can //
T02TD1503E:266a-38: gshin rje 'joms rlung ma rlung mtshams dgod //
T02TD1503E:266a-39: ma ning yi ge bzhi las ni //
T02TD1503E:266a-40: sgo bzhi rnams su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:266a-41: sha sha sa ha las byung ba //
T02TD1503E:266a-42: dbang ldan la sogs yang dag gnas //
T02TD1503E:266a-44: nyi ma la bzhugs gar dang bcas //
T02TD1503E:266a-45: spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-46: phyag nas kha tv'am thod pa gri //
T02TD1503E:266a-47: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1503E:266a-49: khro gnyer rim pa ldan la sogs //
T02TD1503E:266a-50: zur mig blta zhing rnam par g-yo //
T02TD1503E:266a-51: khva gdong la sogs gcer bu ste //
T02TD1503E:266a-52: mgul do spyi gtsug dpung brgyan dang //
T02TD1503E:266a-53: rna cha tshangs pa'i skud par bcas //
T02TD1503E:266b-0: mgo bo'i phreng @266b bsam gul par brgyan //
T02TD1503E:266b-1: rkang gnyis khrol khrol sgra dang bcas //
T02TD1503E:266b-2: g-yon brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs //
T02TD1503E:266b-3: nyi shu rtsa bzhin nyis ldan par //
T02TD1503E:266b-4: dpa' bo rdo rje dril bsnams te //
T02TD1503E:266b-5: phyag ni gnyis kun 'khyud pa yin //
T02TD1503E:266b-6: he ru ka ni sku las byung //
T02TD1503E:266b-7: mkha' 'gro nyi nyi shu rtsa bzhin ni //
T02TD1503E:266b-8: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sku las byung //
T02TD1503E:266b-9: dam tshig ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02TD1503E:266b-10: de nas rdo rje can du brjod //
T02TD1503E:266b-11: dbang bskur go 'phang bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1503E:266b-12: de nas mchod pa yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1503E:266b-13: de dag thams cad sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD1503E:266b-14: da ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i sbyor bas rnam par gzhag par bya ste //
T02TD1503E:266b-15: lhung byed ma ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-16: gsod byed ma ni tsho rab dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-17: 'gugs byed ma ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-18: gar gyi dbang phyug ma ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-19: rab tu gtum mo mi 'dun ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-20: gtum mig ma ni brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-21: 'od ldan ma ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-22: sna chen ma ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-23: dpa' bo'i blo ma ni dad pa'i dbang ba'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-24: mi thung ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang pa'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-25: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-26: ljon grib ma ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-27: sa srung ma ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
T02TD1503E:266b-28: 'jigs byed ma ni dad pa'i stobs so //
T02TD1503E:266b-29: rlung shugs ma ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs so //
T02TD1503E:266b-30: chang 'thung ma ni dran pa'i stobs so //
T02TD1503E:266b-31: sngo ba sangs lha mo ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so //
T02TD1503E:266b-32: shin tu bzang ma ni shes rab kyi stobs so //
T02TD1503E:266b-33: rta rnam ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1503E:266b-34: bya gdong ma ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1503E:266b-35: 'khor lo shugs ma ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1503E:266b-36: dum skyes ma ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1503E:266b-37: glang sna ma ni chos rnam par 'byed ba yang dag byang chub yan lag go //
T02TD1503E:266b-38: 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1503E:267a-0: shin tu dpa' mo ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan @267a * //
T02TD1503E:267a-2: stobs chen ma ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-3: 'khor los sgyu ram ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-4: brtson 'grus chen mo ni yang dag pa'i dag go //
T02TD1503E:267a-5: khva gdong ma ni yang dag ba'i las kyi mtha'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-6: 'ug gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-7: khyi gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-8: phag gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-9: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1503E:267a-10: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rjes brtan ma'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-11: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o ;
T02TD1503E:267a-12: / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-13: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes par nams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-14: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:267a-15: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lhas rnam par sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1503E:267a-16: snying ga'i dbus gyur padma ni //
T02TD1503E:267a-17: 'dab ma brgyad dang ge sar bcas //
T02TD1503E:267a-18: de yi dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa //
T02TD1503E:267a-19: mar me lta bu'i gzugs can te //
T02TD1503E:267a-20: chu shing gi ni me tog ltar //
T02TD1503E:267a-22: de yi dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1503E:267a-23: yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam ste //
T02TD1503E:267a-24: h'um gi sa bon mi shigs pa //
T02TD1503E:267a-25: kha ba lta bu 'bab pa yin //
T02TD1503E:267a-26: ba santa zhes bya ba yin //
T02TD1503E:267a-27: lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed //
T02TD1503E:267a-28: rgod ma'i khar ni me yi gzugs //
T02TD1503E:267a-29: phag mo'i ti la kar ni bzhed //
T02TD1503E:267a-30: las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su //
T02TD1503E:267a-32: ba santa dang phrad pas mnyes //
T02TD1503E:267a-33: snyoms par 'jug pas yang dag zhugs //
T02TD1503E:267a-34: 'di ni shr'i he ru ka yi //
T02TD1503E:267a-35: ba san ti la ka ru bzhed //
T02TD1503E:267a-36: gzugs sogs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02TD1503E:267a-37: stong ba nyid du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1503E:267a-38: sku gsungs thugs kyi bya brag gis //
T02TD1503E:267a-39: sgo gsum nas ni yang dag rgyu //
T02TD1503E:267a-40: 'gro ba dang ni dong ba ru //
T02TD1503E:267a-41: de dag thams cad lus la gnas //
T02TD1503E:267a-42: lte bar aa yi gzugs kyi ni //
T02TD1503E:267a-43: thung du zhes ni bya bar grags //
T02TD1503E:267a-44: snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge h'um //
T02TD1503E:267a-45: ring po cha gnyis tshad du gnas //
T02TD1503E:267a-46: mgrin par gnas pa'i yi ge aom //
T02TD1503E:267a-47: cha gsum pa lu ta zhes brjod //
T02TD1503E:267b-0: dpral @267b bar gnas pa'i yi ge ham //
T02TD1503E:267b-1: sgra dang thig li mi shigs pa //
T02TD1503E:267b-2: 'khor lo bzhi yi bye brag gis //
T02TD1503E:267b-3: sa sogs 'byung ba chen po yin //
T02TD1503E:267b-4: mtshams bzhi ru ni lhag par gnas //
T02TD1503E:267b-5: padma bzhi las yang dag byung //
T02TD1503E:267b-6: dga' ba bzhi yi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1503E:267b-7: sbyor pa bzhi las mchog tu gnas ;
T02TD1503E:267b-9: / mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1503E:267b-10: bya ba dang byed pa'i dngos //
T02TD1503E:267b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1503E:267b-12: 'dir ni ji ltar bde bar ro /
T02TD1503E:267b-13: phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la //
T02TD1503E:267b-14: 'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa bzhi ni //
T02TD1503E:267b-15: mar me lta bu'i gzugs can de //
T02TD1503E:267b-16: mtshams kyi cha la gnas nas su //
T02TD1503E:267b-17: rtsa ni gang dag rgyu ba dag /
T02TD1503E:267b-18: bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyu ba ste //
T02TD1503E:267b-19: mchod pa'i gzugs kyis de la brten //
T02TD1503E:267b-20: de yi gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag / mchod pa bzhi zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD1503E:267b-21: 'di ni lus can snying dbus na //
T02TD1503E:267b-22: rtsa brgyad du ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1503E:267b-23: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD1503E:267b-24: gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod //
T02TD1503E:267b-25: gnas sogs sa la brten nas su //
T02TD1503E:267b-26: gnas dang gnas su yang dag brten //
T02TD1503E:267b-27: mgo bo las ni yang dag byung //
T02TD1503E:267b-28: rtsa ni mgo la skyes zhes brjod //
T02TD1503E:267b-29: snying stobs rdul dang mun pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1503E:267b-30: de dbus sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i gtso //
T02TD1503E:267b-32: blo dang ldan pas phyag rgya bya //
T02TD1503E:267b-33: khva gdong la sogs sngon ji bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:267b-34: lhung byed la sogs rnams par dag / bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:267b-35: phyag rgya rnams ni mtshon cha'o //
T02TD1503E:267b-36: aa las skyes pa'i thod par ni//
T02TD1503E:267b-37: rdzas bcu dag ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1503E:267b-38: rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02TD1503E:267b-39: bsro ba dang ni 'bar bar bya //
T02TD1503E:267b-40: dang po'i yi ge ldan pa ru //
T02TD1503E:267b-41: bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar //
T02TD1503E:267b-42: yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1503E:267b-43: rgyud la sngags ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1503E:267b-44: aom ni thams cad 'bar byed de ;
T02TD1503E:267b-45: / de nyid gsum ni yang dag brjod //
T02TD1503E:267b-46: lha mo de ltar bsgoms pa yi //
T02TD1503E:267b-47: rdzas kyis dngos grub 'bras bu stsol //
T02TD1503E:267b-48: sbyor ba 'di yis dngos grub kyi //
T02TD1503E:267b-50: thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing //
T02TD1503E:268a-0: rnal 'byor can ni skad cig mthong @268a * //
T02TD1503E:268a-1: lha mchog las skyes phrogs nas su //
T02TD1503E:268a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi bu mo spyad //
T02TD1503E:268a-3: gangga'i klung mnyam sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1503E:268a-4: rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa //
T02TD1503E:268a-5: lag tu shing rtog bzhag pa bzhin //
T02TD1503E:268a-6: rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1503E:268a-7: gangga'i klung mnyam zhing rnams ni //
T02TD1503E:268a-8: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid rnams //
T02TD1503E:268a-9: sems kyi rol mo las byung bar //
T02TD1503E:268a-10: rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis mthong //
T02TD1503E:268a-11: 'di ni mchog tu gsang chen te //
T02TD1503E:268a-12: sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02TD1503E:268a-13: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:268a-14: bdud rtsi myang ba ste dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1503E:268a-15: yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags //
T02TD1503E:268a-16: mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor //
T02TD1503E:268a-17: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1503E:268a-18: sde tshan brgyad kyis shin tu bskor //
T02TD1503E:268a-19: sngags rnams thams cad 'byung ba ste //
T02TD1503E:268a-20: gzhan yang ci yang rung ba ste //
T02TD1503E:268a-21: sgra lnga dag ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:268a-22: ya ra la bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1503E:268a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba //
T02TD1503E:268a-24: lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed //
T02TD1503E:268a-25: cha rnams bzhi po dag gis ni //
T02TD1503E:268a-26: kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste //
T02TD1503E:268a-27: longs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba //
T02TD1503E:268a-28: ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin //
T02TD1503E:268a-29: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che //
T02TD1503E:268a-30: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02TD1503E:268a-31: zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba //
T02TD1503E:268a-32: g-yon dang g-yas kyi ngos gnyis su //
T02TD1503E:268a-33: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
T02TD1503E:268a-35: gnas gnyis la ni rtag brten nas //
T02TD1503E:268a-36: 'og dang steng du yang dag brten //
T02TD1503E:268a-37: g-yon dang g-yas kyi ngos gnyis su //
T02TD1503E:268a-38: de bzhin dbyangs yig bcu gnyis ni //
T02TD1503E:268a-39: rtag tu sting du bltas par bri //
T02TD1503E:268a-40: gsog sa 'og tu bltas pa ni //
T02TD1503E:268a-41: ngos gnyis dag tu spel ba ste //
T02TD1503E:268a-42: dbus su de ni spyir bar bya //
T02TD1503E:268a-43: de ltar bstan ba 'di dag ni //
T02TD1503E:268a-44: rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:268a-45: gnyis med ye shes rdo rje ste //
T02TD1503E:268a-46: mkha' 'gro sgra yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:268a-47: nges 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD1503E:268a-48: gang du skye ba zhes byar grags //
T02TD1503E:268a-49: shin tu rnam dag ye shes che //
T02TD1503E:268a-50: lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang //
T02TD1503E:268a-51: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste //
T02TD1503E:268a-52: mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin //
T02TD1503E:268b-0: rang byung @268b gi ni gzugs 'di nyid //
T02TD1503E:268b-1: spro dang sdud par byed pa'o //
T02TD1503E:268b-2: yi ge pho nya la sogs pa sngags //
T02TD1503E:268b-3: der ni cha dang bral ba gang //
T02TD1503E:268b-4: bha ga'i dbus su gzugs med pa //
T02TD1503E:268b-5: de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin //
T02TD1503E:268b-6: smin dbus thig le'i padma ru //
T02TD1503E:268b-7: bcu drug skud pas bskor ba yin //
T02TD1503E:268b-8: shes rab thabs kyi mnyam sbyor gyis //
T02TD1503E:268b-9: kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin //
T02TD1503E:268b-10: gsang ba mchog gi dgyis [?] pa ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-11: thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs gang //
T02TD1503E:268b-12: 'di ni kun mkhyen zhes bya ste //
T02TD1503E:268b-13: kun du 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o //
T02TD1503E:268b-14: padma yin ni sna rtse ru //
T02TD1503E:268b-15: rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas par bsgom //
T02TD1503E:268b-16: yid kyis bzlas dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1503E:268b-17: ngag dang yi ge rnam par spangs //
T02TD1503E:268b-18: nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1503E:268b-19: brtan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no //
T02TD1503E:268b-20: shin tu phra ba rdul dang bral //
T02TD1503E:268b-21: ye shes sku ste dri ma med //
T02TD1503E:268b-22: gsal ba mchog gi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1503E:268b-24: / phan tshun 'dud pa'i gsang sngags ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-25: yul nyid kyis ni dbye par bya //
T02TD1503E:268b-26: sa bon phreng bde nas bsgom //
T02TD1503E:268b-27: h'um gi skud pas bcings pa ste //
T02TD1503E:268b-28: bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur na ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-30: sngags dang thig le 'di dag ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-31: kun rdzob byang chub sems bsgom par //
T02TD1503E:268b-32: bcom 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:268b-33: 'di yi shes rab lhan skyes te //
T02TD1503E:268b-34: de yi gzugs su gyur pas gnas //
T02TD1503E:268b-35: las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su //
T02TD1503E:268b-37: sgyu ma chen mo zhes byar bshad //
T02TD1503E:268b-38: las rnams thams cad sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1503E:268b-39: skra rtse brgyar gyur pa yi cha //
T02TD1503E:268b-40: skad cig glog gi 'od zer can //
T02TD1503E:268b-41: lha yi rnal 'byor lus su ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-42: lte ba'i sgo yi bu ga nas //
T02TD1503E:268b-43: phyogs rnams kun du spros nas ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-44: lha dang lha min kun bsregs te //
T02TD1503E:268b-45: snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-46: bsregs te longs spyod 'khor lor song //
T02TD1503E:268b-47: sna bug g-yas nas byung nas ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-48: slar yang zhugs te smin mtshams kyi //
T02TD1503E:268b-49: mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas ni //
T02TD1503E:268b-50: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1503E:268b-51: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi //
T02TD1503E:269a-0: sna sgo g-yon du zhugs nas @269a * //
T02TD1503E:269a-2: / spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs nas su //
T02TD1503E:269a-3: sngon gyi lam nas slar byung ste //
T02TD1503E:269a-4: slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni zhugs //
T02TD1503E:269a-5: bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1503E:269a-6: dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba yi //
T02TD1503E:269a-7: / dkyil 'khor du ni song gyur nas //
T02TD1503E:269a-8: sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur //
T02TD1503E:269a-9: dga' ba skad cig bye brag gis //
T02TD1503E:269a-10: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya //
T02TD1503E:269a-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:269a-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i bsam gtan no //
T02TD1503E:269a-13: aom na mo bha ga wa te b'i re sh'a ya //
T02TD1503E:269a-14: ma h'a kalpa aagni sanni bh'a ya /
T02TD1503E:269a-15: dza t'a ma gu totka t'aya /
T02TD1503E:269a-16: damsht'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya /
T02TD1503E:269a-17: sa ha sra bhu dza bha su r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:269a-18: par shu b'a sho by'a ta sh'u la kha tv'am ga dha ri ni /
T02TD1503E:269a-19: by'a gh'a n'am ba ra dha r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:269a-20: ma h'a dhu mbr'a ndh'a ka ra pa pu sh'a ya h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:269a-30: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02TD1503E:269a-35: aantra m'a l'a ba lam bi ni grahna grihna /
T02TD1503E:269a-36: ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
T02TD1503E:269a-40: sa pta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu rdzi ga sarba mb'a ta rdza ya ta rdza ya hram hram /
T02TD1503E:269a-44: sngags kyi tshig ni kun la yang //
T02TD1503E:269a-45: aom ni thams cad gsal byed de //
T02TD1503E:269a-46: h'um h'um phat ni mtha' ru sbyar //
T02TD1503E:269a-47: rab gtum la sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1503E:269a-48: rang ming brjod pa'i sngags pa ni //
T02TD1503E:269a-49: dang por aom dang sbyar bya ste //
T02TD1503E:269a-50: h'um h'um phat ni mtha' ru gnas //
T02TD1503E:269a-51: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat d'a ki n'i dzva la samba ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:269a-53: aom hr'i:ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-55: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-56: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-57: aom grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-58: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bidya r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-59: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD1503E:269a-60: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:269a-62: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-64: aom b'i ra h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269a-65: snying po dang nya ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD1503E:269a-66: rje btsun ma'i sngags kyi tshig go //
T02TD1503E:269b-1: de dag ni dpa' bo drug gi go cha'o //
T02TD1503E:269b-7: aom ni kun la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1503E:269b-8: rnal 'byor ma drug go cha yin //
T02TD1503E:269b-15: aam aa:ka kha ga gha dang /
T02TD1503E:269b-21: sha sha sa ha ksha h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:269b-22: dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi gnas so //
T02TD1503E:269b-23: aom na mo bha ga ba ti badzra b'a r'a h'i //
T02TD1503E:269b-24: a'a ry'a pa r'a dzi te tree lo kya m'a te ma h'a bidye shva ri /
T02TD1503E:269b-25: sarba bh'u ta bha y'a b'a he ma h'a badzre /
T02TD1503E:269b-26: badzra sa ni aa ji te aa ba r'a dzi ta ba shyam ka ri ne tra bha ma ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-27: sho sha ni ro sha ni kro dha ka r'a li ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-28: santr'a sa ni m'a ra ni su bra bhe da ni aa pa r'a dza ye /
T02TD1503E:269b-29: bi dza ye dza mbha ni sta mbha ni mo ha ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-30: badzra bh'a r'a hi ma h'a yo gi n'i k'a me shva ri kha ge / ta dya th'a /
T02TD1503E:269b-31: bro tam ge phro tam ge / ha na ha na pr'a n'am /
T02TD1503E:269b-32: ki dki ni kha dkhi ni dhu na dhu ni badzra ha ste sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02TD1503E:269b-33: badzra kha tv'am ga ka p'a la dha re ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-34: ma h'a pi shi ta m'am sa a'a sa ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-35: ma nu shy'a ntra pra bri tte sanni dhyam na ra si ro m'a la granthi ta dh'a ri ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-37: ha na ha na pr'a n'am /
T02TD1503E:269b-38: sarba p'a pa sa tv'a n'am /
T02TD1503E:269b-39: sarba pa sh'u n'am ma h'a m'am sa tshe da ni /
T02TD1503E:269b-40: kro dha m'urte dam shta ka r'a li ni ma h'a mu dre /
T02TD1503E:269b-41: shr'i he ru ka de ba sya aa gra ma hi shi /
T02TD1503E:269b-42: sa ha sra shi re sa ha sra b'a ha be /
T02TD1503E:269b-43: sha ta sa ha sra a'a na ne /
T02TD1503E:269b-44: dzva li ta te dza sya dzve la mu khe /
T02TD1503E:269b-45: bim ga la lo tsa ne /
T02TD1503E:269b-48: mi li ti mi li he he he ha ha h'um h'um kha kha dhu dhu /
T02TD1503E:269b-52: aa dvee ma h'a yo gi n'i pa thi t siddhi dreem dham dreem dham gram gram //
T02TD1503E:269b-53: he he ha ha bh'am me /
T02TD1503E:269b-54: ha sa ha sa b'i re /
T02TD1503E:269b-55: ha ha ho ho h'um h'um tree lo kya bi n'a sha ni sha ta sa ha sra ko ti /
T02TD1503E:269b-56: ta th'a ga ta pa ri b'a re h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269b-57: sam ha r'u pe kha:ga dza r'u pe ga:tree lo kya au da re /
T02TD1503E:269b-58: sa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra sa h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269b-59: b'i r'a dve te h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269b-60: h'a h'a ma h'a pa shu mo ha ni ma h'a yo g'i shva ti tvam /
T02TD1503E:269b-61: d'a ki n'i sarba lo k'a n'i /
T02TD1503E:269b-62: bhandha ni sa dya: yak'a ri ni h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269b-64: ma h'a b'i ra ba ra ma siddhi yo g'i shva ri phat h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1503E:269b-69: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02TD1503E:270a-7: ba sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba lambi ni grihna grihna /
T02TD1503E:270a-8: sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarba mb'a ta rdza ya ta rdza ya /
T02TD1503E:270a-22: aom shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02TD1503E:270a-23: ri bo dang ni ri sul phug / grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni //
T02TD1503E:270a-24: khyad par du ni khang stong dang //
T02TD1503E:270a-25: sems can snod dang thang dang ni //
T02TD1503E:270a-26: khyad par du ni chu la gnas //
T02TD1503E:270a-27: nag po drag po drag chen mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-28: lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02TD1503E:270a-29: nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang //
T02TD1503E:270a-31: rgan byed ma dang drag byed mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-32: 'jigs byed ma dang au ma dang //
T02TD1503E:270a-33: rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang ;
T02TD1503E:270a-34: / mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-35: nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-36: nag spom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-37: dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-38: drag tu sdang dang 'chang ba mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-39: 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-41: drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-42: mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-43: thod phreng phreng can kha tv'am ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-44: sprul chen ral gri dgra sta ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-45: rdo rje de bzhi can ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-47: las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma //
T02TD1503E:270a-48: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-49: rdo rje de bzhin dbang phyug gtso //
T02TD1503E:270a-50: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te //
T02TD1503E:270a-51: rdul med rnal 'byor sbyin pa mo //
T02TD1503E:270a-52: rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis //
T02TD1503E:270a-53: thams cad kun nas 'dir sbyin cig / aom kakka dha na ba bab na kha khkh'a na sarba du shtam ha na ha na gga gga ta na aa mu ka sya sh'antim ku ru h'um h'um phat phat dza:sv'a h'a bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste //
T02TD1503E:270a-54: lha rnams thams cad tshims par bya //
T02TD1503E:270a-56: las rnams thams cad 'grub par bsgom //
T02TD1503E:270a-57: aom bhaksha bhaksha sarba yo g'i shva ri h'um h'um dza:sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:270a-58: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
T02TD1503E:270b-0: dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma @270b thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1503E:270b-1: aom na mo n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a na ye ma h'a yaksha se n'a ba ta ye /
T02TD1503E:270b-2: aa ne ka gam g'a n'a di b'a lu ka au pa ma buddha ko t'i sha ta sa ha sra pa ri britt'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-3: bi kri ta damshtda ka r'a la rlu pa ya aa gnir /
T02TD1503E:270b-4: shi n'a ya na y'a dza li ta bi shra sv'a s'a bhis n'i d'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-5: ba su ki ma ra ga dza bi bhu shi ta ka ra tsa ra n'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-6: krishna bhu dzam ga ya dznyo pa bi t'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-7: dza li ta bhu dzam ga ma ni ma ku t'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-8: phu ri ta to pa ba da n'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-9: sam ku rtsi bhu bhu la t'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-10: da sha na aa pasta dva to sth'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-12: bi dud dzi ha r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-13: ma ho ga bha ksha n'a ya ka ra sphat sa na ka r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-14: su pa na n'a ga r'a dza me kha l'a h'um ka ra na da /
T02TD1503E:270b-15: tr'a sa na ka r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-16: aa shi ti dzo dza na sa ha su ga ra dza nu mandal tsandra aa di tya skandha ba ha n'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-17: damshta ga ka r'a la ma h'a si ta aatt h'a sa na d'a ma h'a sam ksho pa ka r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-18: k'a la r'u p'a ya tree lo kya bhaksha na ka r'a ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-19: n'a g'a mri dyu k'a ya ai mam g'am ga n'a de p'a lu ka sa ma bu ddhee bha ga ba ta aa bhi bh'a sha manta aa barta sh'a mi /
T02TD1503E:270b-21: bho bho ban n'a ga aa dhi pa ta yi /
T02TD1503E:270b-22: ai dan ni n'i l'amba ra dha ra sha r'i ram /
T02TD1503E:270b-23: badzra p'a ni hri da yam /
T02TD1503E:270b-24: ya:sa mba ti kra mtha ma ku la /
T02TD1503E:270b-25: au tsh'a da nam bha bi shya ti //
T02TD1503E:270b-30: ha ra ha ra n'a g'a n'am /
T02TD1503E:270b-31: pra ha ra pra ha ra n'a g'a n'am /
T02TD1503E:270b-32: tstshindi tstshinda n'a ga hri da y'a ni /
T02TD1503E:270b-33: bhinda bhinda n'a ga ma rma ni /
T02TD1503E:270b-34: bi sirya ntu n'a ga sha r'i r'a ni /
T02TD1503E:270b-35: bi spho ta ya n'a ga na ya n'a ni /
T02TD1503E:270b-37: na ga bi d'a r'a na ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-38: n'a gotsh'a da n'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-39: n'i lam pas n'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-40: aa pra ti ha ha pa la ba r'a ka m'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-42: kri t'anta r'u p'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-45: kum bhando tsh'a da n'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-46: pre ta pi sh'a tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-47: yaksha aa pa sma ra bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-50: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-51: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02TD1503E:270b-52: sarba bigh'am bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-53: sarba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat /
T02TD1503E:270b-54: n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni r'a dznya p'a ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD1503E:270b-55: gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas zin pa la ni chu la bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1503E:270b-56: char pa bzlog ba ni thal ba la bzlas nas sprin la bltas te gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD1503E:271a-2: rims la ni skud pa sngon po la bzlas te lag pa la gdags so //
T02TD1503E:271a-3: zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su go ro tsa nal lan stong mngon par bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1503E:271a-4: don la dmigs te gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos gyon la /
T02TD1503E:271a-5: nyin mtshan du kun du ru bsregs te lan brgyad rgya bzlas na rmi lam du dge sdig thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1503E:271a-6: sa la lan bdun bzlas te chom po la bltas nas bus na chom po bas mi mthong zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1503E:271a-7: me tog gam 'bras bung lan bdun bzlas te gang la gtor pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1503E:271a-8: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs so //
T02TD1503E:271a-9: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las btus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub kyi sems kun du gzigs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ka lnga ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1503E:271a-11: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po kr'i ka ra dang /
T02TD1503E:271a-12: lo ts'a ba chen po 'gos lhas bcas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
